trans-unit.source: Specifies the parity bit for a <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件的同位位元。

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration when setting the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity%2A> property for a serial port connection.
trans-unit.target: 當設定，請使用這個列舉型別<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity%2A>序列埠連接的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Parity is an error-checking procedure in which the number of 1s must always be the same—either even or odd—for each group of bits that is transmitted without error.
trans-unit.target: 同位檢查是檢查錯誤的程序，在其中 1 的數量都必須相同，奇數或偶數 — 每個群組的位元的傳輸不會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In modem-to-modem communications, parity is often one of the parameters that must be agreed upon by sending parties and receiving parties before transmission can take place.
trans-unit.target: 在數據機來數據機通訊中，同位檢查通常是其中一個必須同意透過合作對象的傳送和接收合作對象才傳輸會將參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the possible values of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.Parity> enumeration to the console, then prompts the user to choose one.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示可能的值<xref:System.IO.Ports.Parity>列舉型別至主控台，然後提示使用者選擇其中一個。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: Sets the parity bit so that the count of bits set is an even number.
trans-unit.target: 設定同位檢查位元，以便位元集計數為偶數。

trans-unit.source: Leaves the parity bit set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 將同位檢查位元集保持為 1。

trans-unit.source: Sets the parity bit so that the count of bits set is an odd number.
trans-unit.target: 設定同位檢查位元，以便位元集計數為奇數。

trans-unit.source: Leaves the parity bit set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 將同位檢查位元集保持為 0。
